image.title: World News Today, Trending World News, Latest International News, World Breaking News - Times of India

item.title: Bomb cyclone hits northwest US, causing major disruptions; power outages affect thousands
item.description: A powerful storm, classified as a "bomb cyclone", has slammed the northwest US, bringing hurricane-force winds and torrential rainfall. The storm threatens widespread power outages, coastal flooding, and hazardous conditions in mountainous areas. Thousands are already without power as the region braces for the most severe atmospheric river of the season.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Who is Linda McMahon, former WWE CEO chosen by Trump as education secretary
item.description: Former professional wrestling executive and head of the Small Business Administration during Trump's first term, Linda McMahon, has been tapped to lead the department of education. McMahon, a proponent of universal school choice, previously served on the Connecticut Board of Education and has been actively involved in promoting Trump's policies.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Out of picture: Biden, Trudeau and Meloni miss 'family photo' at G20
Religion-based politics on rise in Bangladesh: Report
Hush money trial: DA suggests freezing Trump case while he is president
Germany says damage to Baltic underwater cables should be presumed sabotage
'Not enough to prevail': Zelenskyy warns of Ukraine's possible loss without US aid
item.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy expressed anxiety over potential US military funding cuts, warning it could lead to defeat against Russia. His statement comes amid internal US debates on Ukraine's financial support, fueled by President-elect Donald Trump's skepticism. Zelenskyy emphasized the importance of US-Ukraine unity and Trump's potential influence on Putin to end the conflict.
item.dc:creator: TOI News Desk

item.title: UN: Iran increased stockpile of uranium enriched to near-weapons-grade levels
US won't change nuclear posture after Russia lowers threshold, White House says
Ukraine vows no surrender: 'Russia will be punished'
Russia starts making nuclear-resistant mobile bomb shelters
Is America ready for a woman president? Bill Clinton suggests conservatives may have an edge
item.description: Former US President Bill Clinton shared his perspective on the possibility of a female US president, suggesting that while the nation might be ready, a conservative candidate might have an easier path to victory. He reflected on the challenges faced by female candidates and drew parallels with Margaret Thatcher's success.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Do the Donald! Trump's signature dance finds its way into US sports world
Will Donald Trump stick with Matt Gaetz as attorney general? Here's what he said
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump has reaffirmed his decision to appoint Matt Gaetz as attorney general despite an ongoing investigation into sex trafficking allegations against him. Gaetz, who recently resigned from Congress, faces scrutiny from the House Ethics Committee, with several Senate Republicans demanding the release of their findings before his confirmation.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Rocket boost to their bond: Elon Musk plays host as Donald Trump watches starship launch in Texas
item.description: Elon Musk and President-elect Donald Trump showcased their alliance during Trump's visit to SpaceX's facility. Despite a Starship rocket booster failing to return to the launchpad, the event underscored their deepening relationship. Musk's influence within Trump's circle is evident through his advisory roles and presence at key events. This alliance carries significant implications for American politics, governance, and space exploration.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: What makes E-4B 'Nightwatch' a key player in US national security?
item.description: The E-4B "Nightwatch," a militarized Boeing 747-200, serves as a mobile command center for the US president and key officials during nuclear crises. Equipped with advanced communication systems, EMP resistance, and a "ray dome," the aircraft ensures continuous command and control.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: How are Nordic countries preparing for potential war amid Russia-Ukraine conflict?
item.description: As the Russia-Ukraine conflict escalates, Nordic countries, including Sweden, Finland, Norway, and Denmark, are proactively preparing their citizens for potential crises. These nations are distributing preparedness guides, launching informative websites, and urging citizens to stockpile essential supplies to enhance national readiness for various threats, including military conflict.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Italian village offers homes at $1 for Americans disappointed by Donald Trump's win
item.description: The Italian village of Ollolai is offering homes for just one euro to attract new residents, particularly Americans disillusioned with recent political events. With a dwindling population, the village hopes to revitalize its economy by welcoming digital nomads and those seeking a change of pace. Mayor Francesco Columbu said they made a website specifically to attract American voters in the wake of the presidential elections.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Did Sean 'Diddy' Combs faint in court after allegedly receiving a life sentence? Hereâ€™s the truth behind viral video
item.description: A viral video falsely claimed Sean "Diddy" Combs collapsed in court after receiving a life sentence. Combs is awaiting trial on charges of coercion and abuse, with his attorneys seeking bail and prosecutors alleging witness tampering. His trial is scheduled for May 5th.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk

item.title: Trump picks Cantor Fitzgerald CEO Howard Lutnick as commerce secretary
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump has nominated Howard Lutnick, CEO of Cantor Fitzgerald, for commerce secretary. Lutnick, a longtime Trump supporter, is expected to leverage his Wall Street connections to bolster American manufacturing and potentially cryptocurrency. If confirmed, he would also play a key role in navigating US-China tech competition, particularly regarding semiconductor technology.
item.dc:creator: TOI World Desk
